content: I'm planning to hike the John Muir Trail in September, and I was wondering if you could recommend some good lightweight gear for the trip. I've been doing some research and buying new gear, including a lightweight tent and a water filter. Oh, and by the way, I went on a 5-day hiking trip to Yellowstone National Park last month with my friends Emily and Ryan, and it was an amazing experience! We saw some incredible wildlife, including a grizzly bear and a pack of wolves.
